DOC.brief_title: Phase Iv Study On Muscle Activity Of Two Commercial Preparations Of Botulinum
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects perform 6 ( six ) visit study : Screening visit , perform 30 1 day visit 1 , eligible subject recruit first evaluation perform ; visit 1 , baseline injection perform ; visit 2 , 30 +/- 3 day injection , evaluation perform ; visit 3 , 90 +/- 3 day injection , evaluation perform ; 4 , 120 +/- 3 day injection , evaluation perform ; visit 5 , 150 +/- 3 day injection , evaluation perform . Assessment percentage ( % ) responder , 5 month injection , effect two BT-A preparation , Dysport® Xeomin® , measure frontalis m. wrinkle intensity maximum contraction , measure visual Wrinkles Severity Scale ( WSS ) .
